text: Gumazitam kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgh suam, kɨ amizir igiar me na bagha inabazim, arazir aghuibar a gamir puvatɨ. Egha a bagha nɨghnɨgha, uan inivafɨzimɨn agorogem dɨkabɨnamin gavgavim puvatɨ. Egh a gantɨ tuaviba ua puvatɨgham. Kamaghɨn a uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangɨ, aning uaningɨn ikɨ. An arazir kuram gamir puvatɨ.
